item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: Welcome Hello and w and I’m a consultant, coach, and developer with over 20 years of experience in development on platforms like .NET, Java, and web. During this time, I have gained extensive experience in various technologies, frameworks, and tools. My current focus is on Angular and UX/UI Design, and I’m passionate about sharing technical knowledge with others. Find more about me on the about me page. Sharing is caring I love to share my technical knowledge with others, and that’s one of the main reasons why I started this blog.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, my name is Konstantin Denerz and I am a consultant currently working with @Thinktecture. With over 20 years of experience in product development, consulting, and customer projects, I have gained a wealth of knowledge and expertise in various platforms such as Java, .NET, and the web. My focus for the past 8 years has been web development with Angular, and I have had the opportunity to work on a variety of projects ranging from small-scale startups to large enterprises.

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Welcome to my web development portfolio ✨ page! Here you’ll find code samples showcasing the latest web technologies that I use to create engaging user experiences. I believe the web is an incredible platform for developers to create amazing things, from stunning animations to interactive interfaces. These examples are designed to inspire and show the possibilities of modern web technologies, and to spark ideas for future projects. Whether you’re a developer, designer, or simply interested in web development, I hope you’ll find my page informative and inspiring.
